page.title: 18Wellington Market
page.content: The market has existed for over 60 years.It is open on Tuesday,Thursday and Saturday.There are stalls inside and outside.Many of the vendors have been coming for many years.Vegetables, fabrics,crockery are among the many items offered by some of the 100+ stalls.Some of the tradesmen travel long distances to attend. "As we walked into the hall there was a smell of vegetables and fruit.The market was bustling and crowded with people,chatting and pushing,trying to see what bargains they could find. Stall_holders shouted out their cheap prices.A constant noise surrounded us.People came in and out of the hall. The stalls outside had shelters to keep the stall_holders dry.People had come from the surrounding towns and many people making holiday visits consider Wellington Market a must".
